credit_line: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program and Pauline C. Noyes Funds
title: Facade
description: Drapery and column striped pattern. Drapery swags, printed in beige, run vertically along either edge, containing stars and red finial. Below finial is a gap in drapery, which contains womans hat on stand. Gray column runs down center of design.
name: Sidewall
